mapper.select: select * from procedureinfo where u_id=#{uId} and c_id=#{cId}
mapper.insert: insert into PROCEDUREINFO (U_ID, C_ID, PURCHASETAX, DRIVINGLICENSE, NCW, REGISTRATION, NEWINVOICE, KEY, TRANSFERTIMES, TRANSFERTICKET) values (#{uId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{cId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{purchasetax,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{drivinglicense,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ncw,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{registration,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{newinvoice,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{key,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{transfertimes,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{transferticket,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.update: update procedureinfo set purchaseTax= #{purchasetax,jdbcType=VARCHAR},drivingLicense=#{drivinglicense,jdbcType=VARCHAR},ncw= #{ncw,jdbcType=VARCHAR},registration=#{registration,jdbcType=VARCHAR},newInvoice=#{newinvoice,jdbcType=VARCHAR},key=#{key,jdbcType=DECIMAL},transferTimes=#{transfertimes,jdbcType=DECIMAL},transferTicket=#{transferticket,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where u_id= #{uId,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and c_id= #{cId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
